snippet: Carl Edwards wants a separate group to conduct tests in tandem with the Nascar program that found A.J. Allmendinger had used an unapproved stimulant.
lead_paragraph: Carl Edwards wants a separate group to conduct tests in tandem with the Nascar program that found A.J. Allmendinger had used an unapproved stimulant.

headline.seo: After Allmendinger Suspension, Drivers Debate Testing System
headline.main: Drivers Debate Testing System in Aftermath of a Suspension
headline.print_headline: In Aftermath of a Drug Suspension, Drivers Are Debating Nascar Testing
